abstract: Presents a system dialog for allowing the user to move a collection of existing files to a new location.

declaration.code: nonisolated func fileMover<C>(isPresented: Binding<Bool>, files: C, onCompletion: @escaping (Result<[URL], any Error>) -> Void, onCancellation: @escaping () -> Void) -> some View where C : Collection, C.Element == URL

overview:
## Discussion

For example, a button that allows the user to move files might look like this:

items.description: Presents a system interface for allowing the user to move an existing file to a new location.
